img_summary: The image depicts a torn document or scroll, likely representing an in-game formula or recipe in *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the surrounding context, it is associated with rare formulas such as the Longevity Decoction and Tonifying Decoction, which can be purchased from Xu Dog in specific locations after completing certain chapters. The document plays a narrative or gameplay role as an item tied to crafting or enhancing abilities.
